mapper.select: SELECT W_NO, W_NAME, W_KIND, W_LOCATION, W_VINTAGE, W_AVG, W_REVIEWS, W_IMAGE, W_WINEERY FROM WINE WHERE W_NO = #{w_no}
SELECT S.S_NAME, WL.W_PRICE, S.S_NO FROM STORE S INNER JOIN WINELIST WL ON S.S_NO = WL.S_NO WHERE WL.W_NO = #{w_no}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT W.*, WL.W_AMOUNT, WL.W_PRICE, S.S_NO FROM WINE W LEFT JOIN WINELIST WL ON W.W_NO = WL.W_NO LEFT JOIN STORE S ON WL.S_NO = S.S_NO WHERE W.W_NAME LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{name_Search}) || '%' AND WL.WL_IDX >= 1 OR W.W_NAME LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{name_Search}) || '%' AND WL.WL_IDX >= 1 OR W.W_NAME LIKE '%' || INITCAP(#{name_Search}) || '%' AND WL.WL_IDX >= 1 ) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT W.*, WL.W_AMOUNT, WL.W_PRICE, S.S_NO FROM WINE W LEFT JOIN WINELIST WL ON W.W_NO = WL.W_NO LEFT JOIN STORE S ON WL.S_NO = S.S_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND WL.WL_IDX >= 1 ) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT W.*, WL.W_AMOUNT, WL.W_PRICE, S.S_NO FROM WINE W LEFT JOIN WINELIST WL ON W.W_NO = WL.W_NO LEFT JOIN STORE S ON WL.S_NO = S.S_NO WHERE W_KIND = 'RED' AND WL.WL_IDX >= 1 ) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
